name: Edge
headline: The ultimate patent assistant.
description: Edge uses the newest advances in artificial intelligence and cloud software to provide a secure, easy-to-use patent editor and assistant to help patent attorneys, patent agents, and inventors make the patent process less painful and more effective.

founders.name: Evan Zimmerman, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder of Edge, the ultimate patent assistant. Every company Evan has ever done has involved patents and he holds a JD from UC Berkeley Law School with a specialization in intellectual property. Reach out to talk about how we can help you get better patents! I can also refer you to patent attorneys in my network; I went to the top patent law school in the country.

founders.name: Len Boyette, Founder
founders.description: Len was an early Okta engineer, who founded Okta's developer experience team. He built a platform to power hundreds of Okta integrations and maintained open-source projects which have over a billion installs.

Quality patents for busy professionals
# Task-Based AI for Patents 
The future of patent drafting. Designed for patent professionals. Get hours-long tasks done in seconds.
[Book a Demo![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/667e17ee0778b7a0ee23b6b3_ic-light-arrow.svg)](https://withedge.com/</contact-us>)
![Dashboard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/668470b074e00c457f1bb37e_Screenshot%202024-07-02%20at%202.26.59%E2%80%AFPM.png)
Platform Features
## Powerful. Effortless. Patents.
Eliminate the pain from your drafting process. Edge has a wide variety of features to level-up your drafting.
[![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/667e17ee0778b7a0ee23b73e_ic-overview.svg)DraftingUse AI to help draft and edit key components of a patent application.](https://withedge.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/667e17ee0778b7a0ee23b73f_ic-collaboration.svg)FiguresUse a patent-focused figure editor and AI to get more out of your figures.](https://withedge.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/667e17ee0778b7a0ee23b740_ic-scalability.svg)DisclosureWork with whatever your inventor has to manage and create top-notch disclosures.](https://withedge.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/667e17ee0778b7a0ee23b740_ic-scalability.svg)WorkflowsUse integrated automation to get the work of a patent professional done faster.](https://withedge.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
#### Patent Drafting
Our patent drafting software helps draft quality patents in a fraction of the time. Draft claims, detailed descriptions, backgrounds, and much more. All in our friendly interface.
[Learn More About Drafting![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/667e17ee0778b7a0ee23b6b2_ic-dark-arrow.svg)](https://withedge.com/</patent-drafting>)
![Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/66846c547a5bec22f7c0a680_Screenshot%202024-07-02%20at%202.07.59%E2%80%AFPM.png)
#### Patent Figures
Leverage artificial intelligence to create flow charts, work with figures like block diagrams, edit figures with lead lines, track element names, and more.
[Learn More About Figures![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/667e17ee0778b7a0ee23b6b2_ic-dark-arrow.svg)](https://withedge.com/</patent-figures>)
![Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/66846cef9f50fda40c3ba68e_Screenshot%202024-07-02%20at%202.11.01%E2%80%AFPM.png)
#### Invention Disclosure
Efficiently intake disclosures from inventors using artificial intelligence to parse content and create disclosures in minutes.
[Learn More About Disclosure![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/667e17ee0778b7a0ee23b6b2_ic-dark-arrow.svg)](https://withedge.com/</invention-disclosure>)
![Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/66846d80fa1975dc07ecf99a_Screenshot%202024-07-02%20at%202.13.25%E2%80%AFPM.png)
#### Patent Workflows
Create and manage templates, organize drafts, and more.
[Learn More About Workflows![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/667e17ee0778b7a0ee23b6b2_ic-dark-arrow.svg)](https://withedge.com/</patent-workflows>)
![Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/66846dbe8ec63d0577dece04_Screenshot%202024-07-02%20at%202.14.26%E2%80%AFPM.png)
### Trust and Security
Data security is of the utmost importance. At Edge, we have leading security and privacy practices so you can rest easy satisfying your duties of care and confidentiality.
  * SOC 2 Type II certification
  * Data encrypted in transit and at rest
  * No training on your data, period
  * Data residency options based on practice location


[See Our Trust Page![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/667e17ee0778b7a0ee23b6b2_ic-dark-arrow.svg)](https://withedge.com/<https:/trust.withedge.com>)
![Section Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/667e17ee0778b7a0ee23b727_growth.jpg)![Growth](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/667e17ed0778b7a0ee23b617/6684cdbdf24d5e3dba33789d_21972-312_SOC_NonCPA%20alpha.png)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Edge**

Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W23, Edge is revolutionizing the patent process for professionals like patent attorneys, agents, and inventors. Their mission is clear: to serve as the ultimate patent assistant, leveraging cutting-edge AI and cloud technologies to simplify and expedite patent drafting and management. With a lean team of only two, based in an unspecified location, Edge is small but packed with potential.

**What Edge Does**

Edge’s toolset focuses on four core functionalities:

1. **Drafting**: Users can draft and edit patent applications more efficiently, minimizing the lengthy manual process traditionally involved.
   
2. **Figures**: The platform includes a specialized figure editor that allows professionals to create and manipulate visual content effortlessly, enhancing patent applications visually and functionally.

3. **Disclosure**: Edge helps users intake disclosures directly from inventors quickly, utilizing AI to transform this process into a minute affair rather than a drawn-out one.

4. **Workflows**: Automated workflows streamline patent management, enabling users to manage templates and organize drafts efficiently.

**Security Concerns Addressed**

In today's data-sensitive environment, Edge prioritizes security with SOC 2 Type II certification, encryption, and strict data handling policies. They promise not to train their AI on user data, which is a significant relief for any organization concerned about confidentiality.

**Why Edge Matters**

For busy patent professionals, Edge isn't just a software tool; it’s a means of reclaiming valuable time and resources. By reducing hours of tedious drafting work to mere seconds, Edge is reshaping how patents are made. 

For those looking to navigate the patent world with less pain and more efficiency, Edge appears ready to make a lasting impact. 

If you want to learn more or see the platform in action, visit their website at [withedge.com](https://withedge.com).
